title: pkgcache and Posit Package Manager on Linux
text: PPM repository URL Linux binary packages following form: {base} base URL PPM instance, {repo} PPM repository, {binary_url} code name release Linux distribution (e.g. rhel9), {id} identifier (date) PPM snapshot latest latest snapshot. ppm_platforms() lists platforms supported PPM instance: binary_url column contains code name need use repository URL. ppm_snapshots() lists PPM snapshot dates ids: can use snapshot ids dates PPM repository URL select particular snapshot. text: BioC_mirror option can used select Bioconductor mirror. takes priority R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable. can use pkg.current_platform option set platform string current platform current_r_platform() function. useful pkgcache didn’t detect platform correctly. Alternatively, can use PKG_CURRENT_PLATFORM environment variable. option takes priority. pkgcache_timeout HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_low_speed_limit pkgcache_low_speed_time used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less pkgcache_low_speed_limit bytes per second least pkgcache_low_speed_time seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options.

title: Cache CRAN-Like Metadata and R Packages
text: R_BIOC_VERSION environment variable can used override default Bioconductor version detection force given version. E.g. can used force development version Bioconductor. R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable can used select Bioconductor mirror. BioC_mirror option takes priority , set. can use PKG_CURRENT_PLATFORM environment variable set platform string current platform current_r_platform() function. useful pkgcache didn’t detect platform correctly. Alternatively, can use pkg.current_platofrm option, takes. priority environment variable. PKGCACHE_PPM_REPO name Posit Package Manager repository use. Defaults "cran". PKGCACHE_PPM_URL base URL Posit Package Manager instance use. defaults URL Posit Public Package Manager instance https://packagemanager.posit.co/client/#/. PKGCACHE_TIMEOUT HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_timeout option priority , set. PKGCACHE_CONNECTTIMEOUT HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout option takes precedence , set. PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT bytes per second least PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options. pkgcache_low_speed_time pkgcache_low_speed_limit options priority environment variables, set. R_PKG_CACHE_DIR used cache directory, set. (Otherwise tools::R_user_dir("pkgcache", "cache") used, see also meta_cache_summary() pkg_cache_summary()).

text: bioc_version() returns package_version object. bioc_version_map() returns data frame columns: bioc_version: package_version object, Bioconductor versions. r_version: package_version object, matching R versions. bioc_status: factor, levels: --date, release, devel, future. bioc_devel_version() returns package_version object. bioc_release_version() returns package_version object. bioc_repos() returns named character vector.

title: Query Bioconductor version information — bioc_version
text: bioc_version() queries matching Bioconductor version R version, defaulting current R version bioc_version_map() returns current mapping R versions Bioconductor versions. bioc_devel_version() returns version number current Bioconductor devel version. bioc_release_version() returns version number current Bioconductor release. bioc_repos() returns Bioconductor repository URLs. text: primary_path: Path primary, user level cache. Defaults user level cache directory machine. replica_path: Path replica. Defaults temporary directory within session temporary directory. platforms: see default_platforms() possible values. r_version: R version create cache . bioc: Whether include BioConductor packages. cran_mirror: CRAN mirror use, takes precedence repos. repos: Repositories use. update_after: difftime object. Automatically update cache gets older . Set Inf avoid updates. Defaults seven days. packages: Packages query, character vector. dependencies: kind dependencies include. Works way dependencies argument utils::install.packages(). recursive: Whether include recursive dependencies. force: Whether force cleanup without asking user.

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: cranlike_metadata_cache$new() creates new cache object. Creation trigger population cache. populated demand, queries executed . package, may want create cache instance .onLoad() function package, store package namespace. cheap operation, package still load fast, package code can refer common cache object. cmc$list() lists (specified) packages cache. returns data frame, see list columns . cmc$async_list() similar, asynchronous, returns deferred object. cmc$deps() returns data frame, (potentially recursive) dependencies packages. cmc$async_deps() , asynchronous, returns deferred object. cmc$revdeps() returns data frame, (potentially recursive) reverse dependencies packages. cmc$async_revdeps() , asynchronously, returns deferred object. cmc$update() updates metadata (needed) cache, returns data frame packages, invisibly. cmc$async_update() similar, asynchronous. cmc$check_update() checks metadata current, , updates . cmc$async_check_update() similar, asynchronous. cmc$summary() lists metadata cache, including location size. cmc$cleanup() deletes cache files disk, also memory.

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: metadata data frame contains available versions (.e. sources binaries) packages. usually following columns, might missing platforms. package: Package name. title: Package title. version: Package version. depends: Depends field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. suggests: Suggests field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. built:  Built field DESCIPTION, binary package, NA_character_. imports: Imports field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. archs: Archs entries PACKAGES files. Might missing. repodir: directory file, inside repository. platform: character vector. See default_platforms() platform names. practice value platform column either "source" source packages, platform string, e.g. x86_64-apple-darwin17.0 macOS packages compatible macOS High Sierra newer. needscompilation: Whether package needs compilation. type: bioc cran  currently. target: path package file inside repository. mirror: URL CRAN/BioC mirror. sources: List column URLs one possible locations package file. source CRAN packages, contains URLs Archive directory well, case package archived since metadata cached. filesize: Size file, known, bytes, NA_integer_. sha256: SHA256 hash file, known, NA_character_. deps: package dependencies, data frame. license: Package license, might NA binary packages. linkingto: LinkingTo field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. enhances: Enhances field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. os_type: unix windows OS specific packages. Usually NA. priority: "optional", "recommended" NA. (Base packages normally included list, "base" appear .) md5sum: MD5 sum, available, may NA. sysreqs: SystemRequirements field, available. lists required system libraries software package. usually available CRAN Bioconductor package explicitly available repository metadata. published: time package published , GMT, POSIXct class. data frame contains extra columns well, internal use .

title: R platforms — current_r_platform
R platforms — current_r_platform
text: current_r_platform() returns character scalar. current_r_platform_data() returns data frame character scalar columns: cpu, vendor, os, distribution (Linux), release (Linux), platform: concatenation columns, separated dash. default_platforms() returns character vector default platforms.

title: R platforms — current_r_platform
text: current_r_platform() detects platform current R version. current_r_platform_data() similar, returns raw data instead character scalar. default pkgcache works source packages binary packages current platform. can change , providing different platform names arguments cranlike_metadata_cache$new(), repo_status(), etc. functions accept following platform names: "source" source packages, "macos" macOS binaries appropriate R versions pkgcache working . Packages incompatible CPU architectures dropped (defaulting CPU current macOS machine x86_64 non-macOS systems). macOS Darwin version selected based CRAN macOS binaries. E.g. R 3.5.0 macOS binaries built macOS El Capitan. "windows" Windows binaries default CRAN architecture. currently Windows Vista supported R versions, might change future. actual binary packages repository might support 32 bit 64 builds, one . practice 32-bit packages rare. CRAN builds including R 4.1 architectures, R 4.2 64 bit . "windows" alias i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32 currently. platform string like R.version$platform, Linux name version distribution also included. Examples: x86_64-apple-darwin17.0: macOS High Sierra. aarch64-apple-darwin20: macOS Big Sur arm64. x86_64-w64-mingw32: 64 bit Windows. i386-w64-mingw32: 32 bit Windows. i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32: 64 bit + 32 bit Windows. i386-pc-solaris2.10: 32 bit Solaris. (broken 64 Solaris builds might platform string, unfortunately.) x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-debian-10: Debian Linux 10 x86_64. x86_64-pc-linux-musl-alpine-3.14.1: Alpine Linux. x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-unknown: Unknown Linux Distribution x86_64. s390x-ibm-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04: Ubuntu Linux 20.04 S390x. amd64-portbld-freebsd12.1: FreeBSD 12.1 x86_64. default_platfoms() returns default platforms current R session. typically consist detected platform current R session, "source", source packages.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: R6 class implements concurrency safe package cache.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: default fields included every package: fullpath Full package path. path Package path, within repository. package Package name. url URL downloaded . etag ETag last download, given URL. sha256 SHA256 hash file. Additional fields can added needed. simple API session-wide instance class, see pkg_cache_summary() functions listed .

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
code: pc <- package_cache$new(path = NULL)  pc$list() pc$find(..., .list = NULL) pc$copy_to(..., .list = NULL) pc$add(file, path, sha256 = shasum256(file), ..., .list = NULL) pc$add_url(url, path, ..., .list = NULL, on_progress = NULL,   http_headers = NULL) pc$async_add_url(url, path, ..., .list = NULL, on_progress = NULL,   http_headers = NULL) pc$copy_or_add(target, urls, path, sha256 = NULL, ..., .list = NULL,                on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$async_copy_or_add(target, urls, path, ..., sha256 = NULL, ...,                .list = NULL, on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$update_or_add(target, urls, path, ..., .list = NULL,                on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$async_update_or_add(target, urls, path, ..., .list = NULL,                on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$delete(..., .list = NULL)

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: path: package_cache$new() location cache. functions location file inside cache. ...: Extra attributes search . named. .list: Extra attributes search , named list. file:  Path file add. url: URL attribute. used update file, requested. sha256: SHA256 hash file. on_progress: Callback create progress bar. Passed internal function http_get(). target: Path copy (first) hit . urls: Character vector URLs try download file . http_headers: HTTP headers add HTTP queries.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: package_cache$new() attaches cache path. (default platform dependent user level cache directory.) cache exists, creates . pc$list() lists files cache, returns data frame default columns, potentially extra columns well. pc$find() list files match specified criteria (fullpath, path, package, etc.). Custom columns can searched well. pc$copy_to() copy first matching file cache target. returns data frame matching records, invisibly. file matches, returns empty (zero-row) data frame. pc$add() adds file cache. pc$add_url() downloads file adds cache. pc$async_add_url() , asynchronous. pc$copy_or_add() works like pc$copy_to(), file cache, tries download one specified URLs first. pc$async_copy_or_add() , asynchronous. pc$update_or_add() like pc$copy_to_add(), file cache tries update urls, using stored ETag avoid unnecessary downloads. pc$async_update_or_add() , asynchronous. pc$delete() deletes file(s) cache.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
code: ## Although package_cache usually stores packages, it may store ## arbitrary files, that can be search by metadata pc <- package_cache$new(path = tempfile()) pc$list() #> [1] fullpath path     package  url      etag     sha256   #> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)  cat("foo\n", file = f1 <- tempfile()) cat("bar\n", file = f2 <- tempfile()) pc$add(f1, "/f1") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/Rtmpwkkjty/file16935431efa1//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c pc$add(f2, "/f2") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 2 /tmp/Rtmpwkkjty/file16935431efa1//f2  /f2      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 2 7d865e959b2466918c9863afca942d0fb89d7c9ac0c99bafc3749504ded97730 pc$list() #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/Rtmpwkkjty/file16935431efa1//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #> 2 /tmp/Rtmpwkkjty/file16935431efa1//f2  /f2      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c #> 2 7d865e959b2466918c9863afca942d0fb89d7c9ac0c99bafc3749504ded97730 pc$find(path = "/f1") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/Rtmpwkkjty/file16935431efa1//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c pc$copy_to(target = f3 <- tempfile(), path = "/f1") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/Rtmpwkkjty/file16935431efa1//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c readLines(f3) #> [1] "foo"

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: library Character vector library paths. priority NULL may "base" "recommended" NA vector select base packages, recommended packages packages. (official, CRAN supported package priorities, may introduce others non-CRAN packages.) lowercase Whether convert keys DESCRIPTION lowercase. reencode Whether re-encode strings UTF-8, encodings specified DESCRIPTION files. Re-encoding somewhat costly, sometimes important (e.g. want extract dependencies installed packages). packages NULL, must character vector, packages listed.

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: Differences utils::installed.packages(): parse_installed() subset extracted fields. (can subset result.) parse_installed() cache results. parse_installed() handles errors better. See Section 'Errors' . #' * parse_installed() uses DESCRIPTION files installed packages instead Meta/package.rds files. matter, bug Meta/package.rds might contain wrong Archs field multi-arch platforms. parse_installed() reads fields DESCRIPTION files. utils::installed.packages() reads specified fields. parse_installed() converts output UTF-8 encoding, encodings declared DESCRIPTION files. parse_installed() considerably faster.

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: parse_installed() always returns result UTF-8 encoding. uses Encoding fields DESCRIPTION files learn encodings. parse_installed() check UTF-8 file valid encoding. fails convert string UTF-8 another declared encoding, leaves "bytes" encoded, without warning.

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: pkgcache silently ignores files directories inside library directory. result also omits broken package installations. include packages invalid DESCRIPTION files, packages current user access . errors reported via condition class pkgcache_broken_install. condition errors entry, data frame columns file: path DESCRIPTION file broken package, error: error message particular failure. intend handle broken package installation, need catch condition withCallingHandlers().

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: metadata cache package cache support Bioconductor default, automatically. See BioC_mirror option R_BIOC_MIRROR R_BIOC_VERSION environment variables configure Bioconductor support.

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: BioC_mirror option can used select Bioconductor mirror. takes priority R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable. can use pkg.current_platform option set platform string current platform current_r_platform() function. useful pkgcache didn’t detect platform correctly. Alternatively, can use PKG_CURRENT_PLATFORM environment variable. option takes priority. pkgcache_timeout HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_low_speed_limit pkgcache_low_speed_time used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less pkgcache_low_speed_limit bytes per second least pkgcache_low_speed_time seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options.

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: R_BIOC_VERSION environment variable can used override default Bioconductor version detection force given version. E.g. can used force development version Bioconductor. R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable can used select Bioconductor mirror. BioC_mirror option takes priority , set. can use PKG_CURRENT_PLATFORM environment variable set platform string current platform current_r_platform() function. useful pkgcache didn’t detect platform correctly. Alternatively, can use pkg.current_platofrm option, takes. priority environment variable. PKGCACHE_PPM_REPO name Posit Package Manager repository use. Defaults "cran". PKGCACHE_PPM_URL base URL Posit Package Manager instance use. defaults URL Posit Public Package Manager instance https://packagemanager.posit.co/client/#/. PKGCACHE_TIMEOUT HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_timeout option priority , set. PKGCACHE_CONNECTTIMEOUT HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout option takes precedence , set. PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT bytes per second least PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options. pkgcache_low_speed_time pkgcache_low_speed_limit options priority environment variables, set. R_PKG_CACHE_DIR used cache directory, set. (Otherwise tools::R_user_dir("pkgcache", "cache") used, see also meta_cache_summary() pkg_cache_summary()).

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: use pkgcache CRAN package, please make sure don’t use pkgcache examples, set R_USER_CACHE_DIR environment variable temporary directory (e.g. via tempfile()) test cases. See tests/testthat/setup.R file pkgcache example. make sure pkgcache modify user’s files running R CMD check.

Returns the current Posit Package Manager (PPM) repository URL — ppm_repo_url
text: String scalar, repository URL configured PPM instance. PPM instance configured, URL Posit Public Package Manager instance. includes repository name, e.g. https://packagemanager.posit.co/.

title: Returns the current Posit Package Manager (PPM) repository URL — ppm_repo_url
text: URL form {base}/{repo}, e.g. https://packagemanager.posit.co/. configure hosted PPM instance, set PKGCACHE_PPM_URL environment variable base URL (e.g. https://packagemanager.posit.co). use repo_add() PPM snapshots, may also set PKGCACHE_PPM_REPO environment variable name default repository. Linux, instead setting environment variables, can also add PPM repository repos option, see base::options(). environment variables set, ppm_repo_url() try extract PPM base URL repository name option. PKGCACHE_PPM_URL environment variable set, repos option contain PPM URL (Linux), pkgcache uses public PPM instance https://packagemanager.posit.co, cran repository.

title: List all available Posit Package Manager (PPM) snapshots — ppm_snapshots
text: repository URL snapshot following form Windows:   {base} base URL PPM (see ppm_repo_url()) {id} either date id snapshot, latest latest snapshot. E.g. equivalent:   Linux distribution PPM support, repository URL contains binary packages looks like :   {id} , {binary_url} code name release supported Linux distribution. See binary_url column result ppm_platforms() code names.

what: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: pkgcache uses repos option, see options(). also automatically uses current Bioconductor repositories, see bioc_version(). functions help query manipulate repos option.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
code: repo_get(   r_version = getRversion(),   bioc = TRUE,   cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror() )  repo_resolve(spec)  repo_add(..., .list = NULL)  with_repo(repos, expr)

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: r_version R version(s) use Bioconductor repositories, bioc TRUE. bioc Whether add Bioconductor repositories, even configured repos option. cran_mirror CRAN mirror use, see default_cran_mirror(). spec single repository specification, possibly named character scalar. See details . ... Repository specifications. See details . .list List character vector repository specifications, see details . repos list character vector repository specifications. expr R expression evaluate.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: repo_get() returns data frame columns: name: repository name. Names informational . url: repository URL. type: repository type. also informational, currently can cran CRAN, bioc Bioconductor repository, cranlike: repositories. r_version: R version supposed used repository. set Bioconductor repositories. * others. also informational, used retrieving package metadata. bioc_version: Bioconductor version. set Bioconductor repositories, NA others. repo_resolve() returns named character vector, URL(s) repository. repo_add() returns data frame repo_get(), invisibly. with_repo() returns value expr.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: repo_get() queries repositories pkgcache uses. uses repos option (see options), also default Bioconductor repository. repo_resolve() resolves single repository specification repository URL. repo_add() adds new repository repos option. (remove repository, call option() directly, subset want keep.) with_repo() temporarily adds repositories repos, evaluates expr, resets configured repositories.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: format repository specification named unnamed character scalar. name missing, pkgcache adds name automatically. repository named CRAN main CRAN repository, otherwise names informational. Currently supported repository specifications: URL pointing root CRAN-like repository. Example:   PPM@latest, PPM (Posit Package Manager, formerly RStudio Package Manager), latest snapshot. PPM@<date>, PPM (Posit Package Manager, formerly RStudio Package Manager) snapshot, specified date. PPM@<package>-<version> PPM snapshot, day release <version> <package>. PPM@R-<version> PPM snapshot, day R <version> released. Still works dates starting 2017-10-10, now deprecated, MRAN discontinued: MRAN@<date>, MRAN (Microsoft R Application Network) snapshot, specified date. MRAN@<package>-<version> MRAN snapshot, day release <version> <package>. MRAN@R-<version> MRAN snapshot, day R <version> released. Notes: See PPM https://packagemanager.posit.co/client/#/. RSPM@ prefix still supported treated way PPM@. MRAN service now retired, see https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-sql-blog/microsoft-r-application-network-retirement/ba-p/3707161 details. MRAN@... repository specifications now resolve PPM, note PPM snapshots available 2017-10-10. See https://posit.co/blog/migrating--mran--posit-package-manager/. dates (times) can specified ISO 8601 format. PPM snapshot available date, next available date used. Dates first, last PPM snapshot trigger error. Unknown R package versions trigger error.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
code: repo_get() #> # A data frame: 7 × 5 #>   name          url                           type  r_version bioc_version #> * <chr>         <chr>                         <chr> <chr>     <chr>        #> 1 RSPM          https://packagemanager.posit… cran… *         NA           #> 2 CRAN          https://cran.rstudio.com      cran  *         NA           #> 3 BioCsoft      https://bioconductor.org/pac… bioc  4.4.2     3.20         #> 4 BioCann       https://bioconductor.org/pac… bioc  4.4.2     3.20         #> 5 BioCexp       https://bioconductor.org/pac… bioc  4.4.2     3.20         #> 6 BioCworkflows https://bioconductor.org/pac… bioc  4.4.2     3.20         #> 7 BioCbooks     https://bioconductor.org/pac… bioc  4.4.2     3.20         repo_resolve("PPM@2021-01-21") #>                                                              CRAN  #> "https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/__linux__/jammy/2021-01-21"  #' repo_resolve("PPM@dplyr-1.0.0") #' repo_resolve("PPM@R-4.0.0") with_repo(c(CRAN = "PPM@dplyr-1.0.0"), repo_get()) #> # what: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: checks status configured supplied repositories, specified platforms R versions.

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
code: repo_status(   platforms = default_platforms(),   r_version = getRversion(),   bioc = TRUE,   cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror() )

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: platforms Platforms use, default default_platforms(). r_version R version(s) use, default current R version, via getRversion(). bioc Whether add Bioconductor repositories. already configured via options(repos), can set FALSE. See bioc_version() details pkgcache handles Bioconductor repositories. cran_mirror CRAN mirror use, see default_cran_mirror().

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: data frame row every repository, every queried platform R version. columns: name: name repository. comes names configured repositories options("repos"), added pkgcache. typically CRAN CRAN, current Bioconductor repositories BioCsoft, BioCann, BioCexp, BioCworkflows, BioCbooks. url: base URL repository. bioc_version: Bioconductor version, NA non-Bioconductor repositories. platform: platform, see default_platforms() possible values. path: path packages within base URL, given platform R version. r_version: R version, one specified R versions. ok: Logical flag, whether repository contains metadata file given platform R version. ping: HTTP response time repository seconds. ok column FALSE, columns NA. error: error object HTTP query failed repository, platform R version.

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: returned data frame summary() method, shows information concise table. See examples .

title: pkgcache 2.2.3
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-12 metadata cache now use source URLs packages Archive Posit Package Manager repositories. URLs may serve different package, even source package main URL package serves binary package. alternative URLs needed PPM, anyway, PPM consistent state w.r.t. metadata package files (https://github.com/r-lib/pak/issues/623). parse_packages() now throw warning empty PACKAGES* files (#107). repo_set() ppm_*() functions, e.g. ppm_snapshots(), now work PPM API changes (#110, #115).

title: pkgcache 2.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-04 pkgcache now treats R 4.5.x (current R-devel) macOS binaries correctly. also robust changes macOS platform.

title: pkgcache 2.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-12-10 pkgcache now better job matching R version Bioconductor version.

title: pkgcache 2.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-07-18 New pkg.current_platform option PKG_CURRENT_PLATFORM environment variable override detected platform. repo_add() repo_resolve() MRAN@ prefix now deprecated resolves PPM, MRAN retired soon. See https://posit.co/blog/migrating--mran--posit-package-manager/. metadata cache now SystemRequirements information Bioconductor packages.

title: pkgcache 2.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-06-14 parse_installed() now packages argument, list subset packages. parse_packages() can now parse PACKAGES files trailing whitespace (#93). Bioconductor repositories now include ‘books’ repository, available since Bioconductor 3.12.

title: pkgcache 2.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-04-18 pkgcache now supports binary packages x86_64 macOS R 4.3.0 later (#89). Better Posit Package Manager (PPM) support. New ppm_has_binaries(), ppm_r_versions(), ppm_repo_url(), ppm_snapshots() ppm_platforms() functions help interacting PPM. See new ‘pkgcache Posit Package Manager Linux’ article https://r-lib.github.io/pkgcache. (#47 r-lib/pkgdepends#186).

title: pkgcache 2.0.4
text: CRAN release: 2022-12-16 Update R version -> Bioconductor version mapping. R 4.2.x now maps Bioconductor 3.16.

title: pkgcache 2.0.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-26 built sysreqs columns metadata case always character vectors now, logicals, used edges cases past. deps column metadata cache tibble , data frame tbl class, . cran_archive_*() functions now download metadata newer currently. cran_archive_cleanup() now ignore force argument. sources column metadata cache now correct URL packages CRAN archive (https://github.com/r-lib/pak/issues/425).

title: pkgcache 2.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-08 pkgcache error messages better now. pkgcache now compress metadata cache files, makes loading metadata cache faster.

title: pkgcache 2.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-18 user visible changes.

title: pkgcache 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-16

title: pkgcache 2.0.0
text: Starting version 2.0.0 pkgcache returns data frames instead tibbles. data frames tibbles similar, completely compatible. convert output pkgcache tibbles call as_tibble() function . pkgcache loads pillar package startup, available, uses improve printing pkgcache data frames.

title: pkgcache 2.0.0
text: parse_packages() now automatically determines type PACKAGES* file, instead relying file extensions. pkgcache can now call back PACKAGES file PACKAGES.gz available. (fixes regression pkgcache 1.3.0.) pkgcache now uses HTTP 1.1 Linux well, crashes HTTP/2. pkgcache now supports file:///, repositories, .e. repositories local file system.

title: pkgcache 1.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-29 pkgcache now works better M1 macs. current_r_platform() much better job now. particular, Linux includes name release distribution. new current_r_platform_data() function returns platform information data frame, instead single string. Metadata now accurate Windows packages typically multi-arch R 4.2.0 (current R-devel). pkgcache DCF metadata parser now, much faster, parses fields PACAKGES* DESCRIPTION files. New parse_installed() function get metadata installed packages library. uses new DCF parser, quite fast. meta_cache_list() related functions now correctly set rversion column source R packages "*". pkgcache now uses HTTP 1.1 macOS, work around possible slowdown issue libcurl HTTP/2. pkgcache now uses extra metadata (file sizes, system requirements, etc.) RStudio Package Manager (RSPM) repositories well, long named RSPM getOption("repos").

title: pkgcache 1.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2021-05-19 default location cache changed align standard tools::R_user_dir() cache location. clean old cache call pkgcache:::cleanup_old_cache_dir().

title: pkgcache 1.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-04-14 user visible changes.

title: pkgcache 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-03-01 New repo_add(), repo_get(), repo_resolve() with_repo() functions query manipulate repositories. meta_cache_*() functions now handle getOption("repos") changes correctly. Failed metadata downloads now trigger metadata updates (#52). New bioc_release_version(), bioc_devel_version(), bioc_repos() helper functions deal Bioconductor repositories. Metadata cache functions, e.g. meta_cache_deps() etc. now allow specifying dependency types lowercase (#54).

title: pkgcache 1.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-10-11 package_cache now fail web server send Etag header downloading packages. package_cache now much relaxed HTTP timeouts, handles downloading many packages (slowly) much better. package download progress bar can now suppressed setting pkg.show_progress option FALSE.

title: pkgcache 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-07-07 New repo_status() function query status response time CRAN-like repositories. New bioc_version() bioc_version_map() functions query Bioconductor repositories. pkgcache now fail repositories provide package types. New current_r_platform(), default_cran_mirror() default_platforms() functions. pkgcache now works R 4.0.x macOS binaries.

title: pkgcache 1.0.7
text: CRAN release: 2020-04-18 Metadata now cached RDS version 2 formats, metadata written newer R version can used older R versions well (#36).

title: pkgcache 1.0.6
text: CRAN release: 2020-01-30 HTTP timeouts now much better, default defined terms download speed, instead total download time (#29). pkgcache now tries download metadata PACKAGES file, find PACKAGES.gz (@timmsm, #27). pkgcache now less verbose updating loading metadata.

title: pkgcache 1.0.5
text: CRAN release: 2019-05-31 Fix bug download functions, broke pak downloads.

title: pkgcache 1.0.4
text: CRAN release: 2019-05-13 Fix handling Bioconductor versions repositories, see README details. Now different versions pkgcache, potentially different metadata format, can share metadata cache directory.

title: pkgcache 1.0.3
text: CRAN release: 2019-01-11 Fix concurrency issues async API used multiple times event loop. Make package compatible tibble >= 2.0.0. Add meta_cache_summary() summary() method cranlike_metadata_cache. Return information metadata cache instance.

title: pkgcache 1.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2018-12-31 First public release
